CustomField.formula: "$"&TEXT(Fee__c)&"/"&TEXT(Fee_Unit__c) &" " &IF(Acquisition_Type_Acquisition__c, "acquisition fee valid for ", IF(Acquisition_Type_Reacquisition__c,"reacquisition fee valid for ", IF(Deposit_Fee__c, "deposit fee", TEXT(Management_Fee_Type__c) & " management fee valid for "))) &IF(OR(Acquisition_Type_Acquisition__c, Acquisition_Type_Reacquisition__c), /* Acq and Reacq */ IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Shared_Solar_System__c)), " customers on " & Shared_Solar_System__r.Name & " and","") &" customer opportunity group(s): {" &IF(Acquisition_Cust_Group_Anchor__c, "Anchor, ", "") &IF(Acquisition_Cust_Group_Public_Offtake__c, "Public Offtake, ", "") &IF(Acquisition_Cust_Group_Residential__c, "Residential, ", "") &IF(Acquisition_Cust_Group_Non_Residential__c, "Non-Residential", "") &"} where customers were acquired by " &IF(Acquisition_Channels_BCS_Acquired__c, IF(Acquisition_Channels_Non_BCS_Acquired__c, "BCS or the Client", "BCS"), IF(Acquisition_Type_Reacquisition__c, "the client", "")) &" and is valid when a customer " &IF(Acquisition_Sizing_Type_Upsizing__c, IF(Acquisition_Sizing_Type_Downsizing__c, "increases or decreases", "increases"), IF(Acquisition_Sizing_Type_Downsizing__c, "decreases", "")) &" in size (kW) ", /* Management */ IF(Management_Fee__c, IF(ISBLANK(Shared_Solar_System__c), IF(Project_Capacity_Group_Anchor__c, IF(Project_Capacity_Group_Non_Anchor__c, "anchor and small offtake capacity", "anchor capacity"), IF(Project_Capacity_Group_Non_Anchor__c, "small offtake capacity", "")) &" on " &IF(Project_Type_Acquisition_Management__c, "Acquisition & Management", IF( Project_Type_Management_Only__c, "Management-Only", "")) &" projects", Shared_Solar_System__r.Name) &", beginning on " & TEXT(Management_Fee_Trigger__c) & " date" &IF(ISPICKVAL(Management_Fee_Type__c,"Recurring"), ". It is charged " & TEXT(Recurring_Frequency__c),"") &IF(ISBLANK(Recurring_Escalator__c),"", " with a " & TEXT(Recurring_Escalator_Frequency__c) & " escalator of " & TEXT(Recurring_Escalator__c*100) & "%"), /* Deposit Fee */ "") )
CustomField.label: Fee Summary
